snippet: SHULTIS--John "Jack" Clinton, 83, of Manahawkin, NJ passed away on Monday, December 14, 2015. Jack enjoyed long career in TV videotape editing with NBC, EUE Screen Gems, and Nexus. For more details, to view the complete obituary for Jack and to leave condolences for the family, please visit: www.shinnfuneralhome.com 1/3
